site_name: NATURAL HISTORY EDUCATION CO OF MIDSOUTH

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process on Thursday May 12th.
The inspector arrived at the gate at 2:35pm and left voice mail messages on both licensee's cell phone and home phone
along with a text message. At 3:00pm licensee's wife drove up to gate on her way to a school pickup. Inspector offered to
wait to do inspection upon return but was told that was not possible due to a work commitment. Licensee sent reply text
that he was not available.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process on Thursday May 12th. 
The inspector arrived at the gate at 2:35pm and left voice mail messages on both licensee's cell phone and home phone 
along with a text message. At 3:00pm licensee's wife drove up to gate on her way to a school pickup. Inspector offered to 
wait to do inspection upon return but was told that was not possible due to a work commitment. Licensee sent reply text 
that he was not available. 
 
 
 
End Section
